title: NVIDIA releases new physical AI models, plus autonomous vehicle tools
description:
NVIDIA released Cosmos, GR00T, and Alpamayo open models to help developers build reasoning machines including robots and vehicles.

The post NVIDIA releases new physical AI models, plus autonomous vehicle tools appeared first on The Robot Report.
